AI Description: scikit-bio is a Python library for bioinformatics that provides tools for biological data manipulation, analysis, and visualization. It offers functionality for working with biological sequence data, phylogenetic trees, and related metadata.
Core Features: Manipulation Of Biological Sequence Data, Phylogenetic Tree Analysis, Metadata Handling, Sequence Alignment, Statistical Analysis For Biological Data
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Python Library, Biological Data Analysis, Sequence Analysis
